messages.subject: New to Unschooling - reporting question, NY
messages.msgSnippet: I am new to unschooling, I have recently pulled my 8 yr old son from second grade at a Waldorf school. I have found much relief in the idea of child lead
messages.messageBody:
I am new to unschooling, I have recently pulled my 8 yr old son from second grade at a Waldorf school. I have found much relief in the idea of child lead learning, and gotten some great support from another homeschooling yahoo group. However,if anyone has examples of quarterly reports please share,as I am in N.Y. State and the laws are more strict. I have a great ihip form already. Thanks so much!
Kiki

[moderator's note: general replies are fine on the list but please send specific advice directly to the poster - tnx]
